quotes.quote: Extreme law is often extreme injustice.
Extraordinary results happen only when you give the best you have to become the best you can be at your most important work.
Intense feeling too often obscures the truth.
Extreme hopes are born from extreme misery.
Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.

The most intense conflicts, if overcome, leave behind a sense of security and calm that is not easily disturbed. It is just these intense conflicts and their conflagration which are needed to produce valuable and lasting results.
Powerful indeed is the empire of habit.
Every intense desire is perhaps a desire to be different from what we are.
You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
Out of intense complexities intense simplicities emerge.
Intense, burning desire is the motivational force that enables you to overcome any obstacle and achieve almost any goal.
The more intense the nature of a man, the more readily will he find meditation, and the more successfully will he practice it.
Intensity is the extreme application of force and strength.
Extraordinary people survive under the most terrible circumstances and they become more extraordinary because of it.
The pressures are intense, because the rewards for success and the penalty for failure are more and more.
An intense feeling carries with it its own universe, magnificent or wretched as the case may be.
